title: "Retro Space Adventure"
content:
# Retro Space Adventure

Welcome to Retro Space Adventure, a website dedicated to the exploration of space through the lens of nostalgia. Our pixel art depiction of a spacecraft sets the tone for our playful and imaginative approach to space travel.

Join us on a journey through the cosmos as we explore the wonders of the universe with a retro twist. From classic sci-fi movies to vintage video games, we draw inspiration from the past to create a unique and engaging experience.

Whether you're a seasoned space enthusiast or just looking for a fun and lighthearted escape, Retro Space Adventure has something for everyone. So come aboard our pixelated spacecraft and let's blast off into the stars!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A pixel art depiction of a spacecraft, with blocky shapes and limited colors creating a nostalgic and playful feel."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
